docs.text: Yuhao Yang (杨雨豪) Undergraduate Student at School of Computer Science Wuhan University About Hi! I am a 3rd year undergraduate ( looking for an AI Ph.D position ) at WHUIR Group under the supervision of Prof. Chenliang Li . Currently, I'm also working with Prof. Irwin King (CSE, The Chinese University of Hong Kong) as a research intern. My research interests include Information Retrivel , Data Mining and Natural Language Processing . I'd like to explore solid innovations with good interpretability and simplicity in machine learning methods and their applications. I am open to academic collaborations and please drop me an email if you have a research proposal. Social
